definitions.text: the 3rd planet from the sun; the planet we live on
examples: the Earth moves around the sun

definitions.text: the loose soft material that makes up a large part of the land surface
examples: they dug into the earth outside the church

definitions.text: the solid part of the earth's surface
examples: the plane turned away from the sea and moved back over land
the earth shook for several minutes
he dropped the logs on the ground

definitions.text: the abode of mortals (as contrasted with Heaven or Hell)
once thought to be one of four elements composing the universe (Empedocles)
the concerns of this life as distinguished from heaven and the afterlife
examples: they consider the church to be independent of the world

definitions.text: a connection between an electrical device and a large conducting body, such as the earth (which is taken to be at zero voltage)
hide in the earth like a hunted animal
